name: AllSome Fulfillment
headline: Fulfillment platform to build Southeast Asia e-commerce operations
description: AllSome is a Fulfillment-as-a-Service platform for Southeast Asia e-commerce sellers to build self-run fulfillment operations. No upfront fee, 99.99% on time shipping and 50% cost saving.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[ ![AllSome Green Logo](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/allsome_neon_green_logo.png) ![AllSome White Logo](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/logo-main-white.png) ](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/>)
  * [How AllSome Works](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/my/#features>)
  * [Pricing](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/my/#pricing>)
  * [Contact](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/my/#contact>)
  * [Region ](https://www.allsome.com/<#features>)
    * [ Malaysia ](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/my>)
    * [ China ](https://www.allsome.com/<#>)
      * [ Ship from China ](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/cn>)
      * [ Shopee Malaysia ](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/cn/shopee-my>)
      * [ SEA Ready ](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/seaready>)
  * [ English ](https://www.allsome.com/<#features>)
    * [English](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/land/language/en>)
    * [Bahasa](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/land/language/bm>)
    * [中文](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/land/language/cn>)
  * [AwesomeLah Stock Clearance](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/awesomelah>)


[ Sign Up ](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: register_now\(\);>)
# Automate e-commerceoperations
AllSome is your e-commerce operation team to auto-send your sold orders.Once sold, considered done!
[ Get started for free](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/register/seller>)
![FREEDOM Screen Image](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/l1/png/l1-hero-img.png)
Speed up for more than **9,000,000+** items 
![Shopify](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/camp/d11/woocommerce.png)
![Shopee](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/camp/d11/shopify.png)
![Lazada](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/camp/d11/shopee.png)
![Woocommerce](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/camp/d11/lazada.png)
![Shopline](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/camp/d11/shopline.png)
1
### Connect store
Send AllSome your inventory and online your preferred outlets for free.
2
### Autorun operations
Sync paid orders and wake warehouse team to ship the orders.
3
### Speed up orders
Everyone can self-service anytime with no more wait time. It's even possible to add speed!
## Move e-commerce orders without back-and-forth communications
AllSome simplified delivery changes by offering freedom for everyone to make decision from all available options without giving up experience. 
#### Workflow Management
## Automate delivery & returns
AllSome puts your entire e-commerce workflow on autopilot, do everything from sync paid orders to returns, so you can focus on growing the business. 
[Get started for free](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
![](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/l1/png/l1-content1-img.png)
![](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/l1/png/l1-content2-img.png)
#### On Demand Delivery Management
## Keep up to buyer changes
It's like getting a virtual assistant, serving your buyers 24/7. Buyers can personalize their delivery in just a few clicks - speed up to their liking.
[Setup FREEDOM now! ](https://www.allsome.com/<https:/www.allsome.io/register/seller>)
#### The Awesome Approach
## Make more connectionsonline & offline
E-commerce is virtual, human touch make it warmer. AllSome is the new way to experience e-commerce offline, making meaningful connections between brands and buyers. 
[Get started for free](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
![](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/conference/png/content-3-img.png)
![](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/conference/png/fill-dot-red.png)
![](https://www.allsome.io/media/shade-pro/image/conference/png/content-3-round.png)
## Do more of what you do best
## Everything you need to run yourawesome e-commerce
##### Multiple platforms
Integrate seamlessly, AllSome Open API, bulk upload and place single order through portal.
##### Ship fast
Domestic, international, Cash on Delivery (COD), standard, same day, one hour or self pick up.
##### Physical outlets
Free access to all our locations. Be next to your shopper to make the experience real & right.
##### Try before purchase
Let shoppers find and order the most suitable one, they will definitely return again!
##### Return & exchange
Return to store and exchange same day. Free shipping and 10x faster return experience.
##### Customizable logic
Share your e-commerce procedures and outlets execute as instructed. Take control and work from anywhere.
##### Inventory reports
Clean & report for inbound, in-store and shipped SKUs. By orders, locations and dates.
##### Giveaway & samples
Reach more shoppers with your trial sets and let the products sell for themselves!
##### Data insights
Get actionable insights and know how your shoppers interact with your products in real life.
## Pricing & Plans
Free access to outlets, pay-as-you-go.
Handling
MYR
##  .
  * MYR1.00 / extra item 


[Get started for free](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
Storage
##  .
  * Free 30 meter cube / month


[Get started for free](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
Delivery
##  .
  * Free for Shopee & Lazada 


[Login for live rates](https://www.allsome.com/<login>)
### How can my shoppers try my products at outlets?
Share your outlet links to your shoppers, shoppers can book the experience and walk in to try as wanted! [Contact us to learn more ](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
### I'm selling in Shopee, what is the total fee to ship an order?
Assumed you have 2 items (below 1KG each) in an order.The total fee = 2 items x MYR1.00 = MYR2.00 That's all! [Contact us to learn more ](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
### I sell in multiple e-commerce platform, can I still use AllSome?
Certainly, AllSome is integrated with Shopify, Shopee, Lazada, Woocommerce and Shopline.Shipping fee is chargeable if the orders are not shipped under Shopee Logistics or Lazada Logistics.
### How can I pass AllSome the order details & instructions?
Once sign up with AllSome, we will integrate with your sales stores to automate the process.Paid orders will be packed and shipped automatically! We also come with open API for integration, dashboard to place orders and perform bulk order upload.
### Can AllSome supports return & exchange?
Yes! AllSome system enable you to define the return logic for approved return orders.Once returned, AllSome outlet will receive, quality check and exchange as needed. 
### Can I use AllSome to collect Cash On Delivery (COD)?
Yes! We offer weekly settlement back to your given bank account in your home currency. Let's get started by contact AllSome Sales today! [Contact us to learn more ](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
### How storage fee is calculated?
We measure the dimension for every item. For example, 25cm (width) x 35cm (height) x 3cm (thickness) = 0.25 x 0.35 x 0.03 = 0.0026 meter cube per item Storing 300 pieces of the item above = 0.0026 x 300pcs = 0.78 meter cube per day. Storing for 30 days = 30 x 0.78 = 23.4 meter cube For all our awesome sellers, we offer FREE 30 meter cubes per month. If your inventory is less than 30 meter cube as above, it's FREE! 
### What if I stored more than 30 meter cubes per month?
No problem, we come with 500 hubs with unlimited space for your need. Let's say if you stored 35 meter cubes in that month, 5 meter cube is chargeable. 5 meter cube x MYR2.00 per meter cube = MYR10.00 only. [Get started now ](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
Haven’t got your answer? [Contact our support now](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: view_contact_us\(\);>)
## Can't make up your mind? Book & experience yourself!
Let's empower fulfilling e-commerce together!Contact us today!
### Whatsapp Us
[(+60)11-51624248](https://www.allsome.com/<javascript: whatsapp_us\(\);>)
### Email Us
support@allsome.my
### Visit Us
LEVEL4, Block 9, Hap Seng Business ParkPersiaran Perusahaan, Kawasan Miel 40300, Shah Alam, Selangor, Malaysia.

generated_description:
### AllSome Fulfillment Overview

AllSome Fulfillment is making waves in the Southeast Asia e-commerce landscape by empowering sellers with a seamless fulfillment-as-a-service platform. Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W19, AllSome initially focused on helping e-commerce sellers manage their logistics without the usual headaches. Their motto? “No upfront fee, 99.99% on-time shipping, and a 50% cost savings.” 

#### Mission and Vision
Their mission centers around facilitating and enhancing e-commerce operations across Southeast Asia. They provide the tools for sellers to effectively run their own fulfillment processes, thereby streamlining the logistics chain and fostering growth.

#### Key Features
- **Automated Operations**: Once an order is sold, AllSome handles everything to ensure it’s delivered without extra back-and-forth communication.
- **Multiple Platform Integration**: Whether you’re using Shopify, Shopee, Lazada, or WooCommerce, AllSome's Open API allows seamless connectivity and management of orders across different channels.
- **Cost Efficiency**: Sellers enjoy free access to centralized distribution centers, and the pricing model is pay-as-you-go—an attractive liability-light approach for e-commerce ventures.
- **On-Demand Delivery**: With personalized delivery options and a virtual assistant-like service, AllSome is tailored to keep pace with buyer preferences.

#### Team and Location
Based in Shenzhen, China, AllSome operates with a dedicated team of 18 employees, emphasizing their commitment to personal service and innovation in the fulfillment sector.

#### Overall Impact
AllSome is targeting the logistics gap in Southeast Asia's booming e-commerce market. Their approach reduces costs and enhances the efficiency of online operations, giving sellers more control while allowing them to focus on scaling their businesses without the logistical burden. They embody the principle that making fulfillment easier and more efficient can empower e-commerce—enabling sellers to focus on what they do best: selling.

For further details, check out their website [AllSome Fulfillment](https://www.allsome.com).
